press_button.description: Press the button to control oven functionality.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to adjust temperature or cooking mode.

clean_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body to remove grease or food particles.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure correct functioning of oven settings.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to get rid of any dust or grime.

clean_whole_oven.description: Clean the entire oven including the oven body, button, and knob.
